newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: GOLF-SOUTH AFRICAN PGA CHAMPIONSHIP FIRST ROUND SCORES.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-SOUTH AFRICAN PGA CHAMPIONSHIP FIRST ROUND SCORES.

text.p: first round of the South African PGA Championship at par 72
Houghton Golf Club on Thursday (South African unless stated):
66 Alan McLean, Bob May (U.S., John Nelson, Mark Murless,
67 Ian Hutchings, Gary Emerson (Britain), Nick Price
68 Max Anglert (Sweden), Desvondes Botes, Trevor Dodds
(Namibia), Brad Ott (U.S.), Craig Kamps, Nico van Rensburg
Clinton Whitelaw, Bradford Vaughan, Wayne Westner, A.P.Botes,
Stephen Gallacher (Britain), Wayne Bradley, Gary Clark
